member.name: M:Ozone.LanguageDetector.Detector.DetectLanguageFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Detects the language based on the file extension
member.returns: The language of the file. Returns Language.Language

member.name: M:Ozone.LanguageDetector.Detector.DetectLanguageFromSnippet(System.String)
member.summary: Detects the language of a snippet of code
member.returns: The language of the snippet. Returns Language.Language
